alert.note: Alert for Walker; Winston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 07 at 9:21AM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Walker and Winston Counties through 1015 AM CST... At 921 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Needmore to near Guin. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jasper, Haleyville, Carbon Hill, Lynn, Arley, Double Springs, Addison, Kansas, Nauvoo, Eldridge, Curry, Houston Recreational Area, Camp McDowell, Nesmith, Ashbank, Brushy Lake, Poplar Springs, Ashridge, Falls City and Moreland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
